name: Brfck-base
tagline: compilers for brainf*ck based languages such as l33t and Ook(this one not yet)
body:
##INSTRUCTIONS

1. Create a file.
2. Fire up a terminal and enter this directory.
3. Write python <matching interpreter> <file>
4. See it converting!
5. brfck-core.py interprets it!

###NOTE
l33t.py does NOT interpret 9, 10 and 0!
L0L0L0L0L0L0L0L0L0L
Also, it does not increment the value in the active cell or move the pointer when not requested.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
